main.name: Nordic-Giant Project
main.bio: As a developer, my motto is if I am the smartest person in the room, Iâ€™m in the wrong room. I love to learn from people with different perspectives on a project and want to become the best developer I can be.

work.title: Senior Software Development Tutor
details: Tutored coding boot camp students in full-stack web development and data visualization by using technologies such as React.JS, Node.JS, D3.JS, Pandas, Matplotlib, Visual Basic, & SQL
Developed Python program to automatically send session confirmation emails to all students

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
details: Developed web application to replace Adminer, an internal legacy application that allows staff to input SQL queries into the production database
Reduced website outages by verifying that database modifications inputted by employees would not remove sensitive information

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
details: Produced 3D models of objects by using OnShape and NX CAD software
Developed Python program to control a Raspberry Pi-powered rover remotely through keyboard and voice through web sockets and the wit.ai API

work.title: Student Aide II
details: Influenced K-12 students at local schools and colleges to choose STEM careers
Produced objects from 3D printers by using CAD software
Developed Raspberry Pi program to detect local radiation exposure with a Geiger Counter

work.title: Contract Software Engineer
details: Developed minimum viable iOS and Android apps for The Shoeshine Guild, a business that handles shoeshines and repairs for more than 5000 monthly customers
Implemented user authentication, payment processing, and push notifications by using React Native, Expo, Stripe, and Firebase
Implemented delivery service by using Postmates API

projects.title: PowerPaint
projects.category: A real-time paint application where you can collaborate on drawings with others

projects.title: Two-Factor Authentication Meteor
projects.category: A demonstration of integrating two-factor authentication into the Meteor.js Accounts package using the Twilio API

projects.title: Auto Student Email
projects.category: A program that automatically sends out confirmation emails to coding boot camp students.

projects.title: Shoeshine Guild
projects.category: An iOS app where customers can request for their shoes to be shined or repaired and have it delivered to their house using the Postmates API
